name: Dream Tiles 2019 for Undertale & Deltarune
description:
Have you ever dreamed of playing piano like a cool pianist? Have you ever dreamed of playing lovely Deltarune songs on a piano? Do you want to feel rhythm of Deltarune songs and fly to music world with magic?

Now here we are to make your dream come true with Deltarune Dream Tiles 2019! With Deltarune Dream Tiles 2019 your smart phone becomes a super piano. You can easily perform Deltarune songs and other hit piano song on your phone anywhere, anytime you want to play.

HOW TO PLAY:
Deltarune Dream Tiles 2019 is very easy to play. All you need to do is Tapping on the black piano tiles. Don’t tap the white tiles. Hold the long piano tiles until the end of tiles to get more score.

Features:
1. Beautiful anime graphics and excellent sound effect.
2. High quality piano songs including classic music, 500+ pop songs, 200+ anime songs and other movies songs
3. Regular Updates! We will improve Deltarune Dream Tiles 2019 with new songs and new features.
4. Endless game with speed increasing. Are you ready for test your finger speed?

Download Deltarune Dream Tiles 2019 for free. This game get you have a good music with beautiful anime piano songs!

DISCLAIMER:
Deltarune Dream Tiles 2019 is an unofficial fan application. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by Deltarune, their management, or record label.

This app does not include any copyrighted material.
The piano melodies are arranged with individual piano notes
This app is for entertainment purposes only.

FEEDBACK:
Feel free to comment your favorite song in review. we will try to add as soon as possible
